There will be a football game in our school next Friday.
questions.answer: 下周五我们学校将会有一场足球比赛。

title: ——妈妈，我饿了！有什么吃的吗？
——第一层橱柜里有一盒饼干和一块巧克力。
answer: ——Mom, I'm hungry！Is there something to eat?
——There is a box of biscuits and a bar of chocolate in the first cupboard.

title: ——你的衣帽间里有什么？
——有一百双高跟鞋和一千多件衣服。
——你真富有。
answer: ——There are one hundred pairs of high-heel shoes and more than one thousand clothes in it.

title: ——这儿已经有几个月不下雨了。
——太可怕了，这个地区的庄稼长得不好。
answer: ——There has been no rain for several months.
——It is terrible. The crop does not grow well in this area.
